snippet: Randy Graff, Cady Huffman and Judy Kaye, three alumnae of Coleman shows, perform an affectionate tribute, directed by Will Nunziata, at Feinstein’s/54 Below.
abstract: Stephen Holden review musical tribute Our Guy, Cy: The Songs of Cy Coleman, directed by Will Nunziata and performed by singers Randy Graff, Cady Huffman and Judy Kaye, at Feinstein’s/54 Below.
lead_paragraph: Randy Graff, Cady Huffman and Judy Kaye, three alumnae of Coleman shows, perform an affectionate tribute, directed by Will Nunziata, at Feinstein’s/54 Below.

headline.main: Review: ‘Our Guy, Cy: The Songs of Cy Coleman’ Pays Tribute to a Man and His Musicals
